attributes.additional_details: We need to help stop all the protest's which are killing innocent people over something that took place 41 years ago. Why is Bangladesh bringing this up  now for? What good would it do? We should all be one nation and not get the past back in presence. What good is it doing anyone? People are being targeted for having a beard and then getting beaten? IS THIS HUMANITY? Before Bangladesh get's into CIVIL WAR we as HUMANS need to get everyone to sign so BANGLADESH can stop this before it get's too LATE! RELIGION, POLITICS, RACE does it matter? HELP BANGLADESH by signing! We need the UK to speak to BANGLADESH and tell them that in this procedure a lot of INNOCENT people are being hurt. We need the UK to help by speaking to the BANGLADESH GOVERNMENT!
